ANU.name: Voon Hui  Lai
interest: Natural hazards, earth structure, deep earth, ground motion, environmental seismology
ANU.biography: I'm an observational seismologist by training. My research interests include understanding natural hazard processes and important long-term dynamics informed by small-scale heterogeneities along major structural boundaries (e.g. basin, plate boundaries and core-mantle boundary). I observe these processes and heterogeneties using multiple data types including seismometers, infrasound sensor, distributed acoustic sensing (DAS) and model the waveforms using methods such as large-scale HPC waveform simulation and moment tensor inversion.
